articles.title: Chess body investigating ex-world champion who accused Daniel Naroditsky of cheating - NPR
articles.description: U.S. chess grandmaster Daniel Naroditsky died this week at age 29. Former world champion Vladimir Kramnik had accused Naroditsky, among others, of cheating in the sport.
